meanings.definition: The act of blending or mixing together.
meanings.sent1: The interfusion of colors created a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent2: The interfusion of flavors in the soup made it delicious.
meanings.sent3: The interfusion of music and dance at the party kept everyone entertained.
meanings.sent4: The interfusion of cultures in the city made it a vibrant and diverse place.
meanings.sent5: The interfusion of ingredients in the cake made it moist and flavorful.

meanings.definition: The state of being blended or mixed together.
meanings.sent1: The interfusion of different scents in the garden was delightful.
meanings.sent2: The interfusion of voices in the choir created a harmonious sound.
meanings.sent3: The interfusion of patterns on her dress made it look unique.
meanings.sent4: The interfusion of ideas in the meeting led to a creative solution.
meanings.sent5: The interfusion of aromas in the kitchen made it inviting.
